body:
Considering everything else this artist has done, let me sum it up for you:

Guy gets turned into a girl, forcefully.  His otherwise amicable best friend rapes the fuck out of him/her over and over for no other reason than that s/he's now a girl.  S/he gets a chance to turn back into a guy and decides not to because his/her best friend raping him/her made her somehow docile and subordinate to him.
